response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to both parties involved. Considering its significance and the potential benefits it offers, we are extending an offer to purchase this product at a price of $1,400,000. This amount reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to us and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. We believe this proposal will facilitate a successful negotiation and secure the acquisition of the product for you. Should you have any inquiries or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1400000}
